wikipedia_page.main:
Karl Senior (born 3 September 1972 in Northwich) is an English former footballer.
A Midfielder, Senior made one Football League appearance in his career when he came on for Chester City (where he was an apprentice) in a 1–0 defeat at Mansfield Town on 20 January 1990. He was one of three youngsters during the season to make a solitary substitute appearance for Chester, along with Mick Hayde and Derek Nassari.Senior did not make any more first–team appearances for Chester and later joined Northwich Victoria.
